This is expected behaviour: you can reuse an exising variable. If it doesn't exist, it has to be created first.
You probably want to use tf.AUTO_REUSE, which will reuse a variable if possible:

cell = tf.nn.rnn_cell.LSTMCell(3, reuse=tf.AUTO_REUSE)

body:
This is expected behaviour: you can reuse an exising variable. If it doesn't exist, it has to be created first.
You probably want to use `tf.AUTO_REUSE`, which will reuse a variable *if possible*:
```
cell = tf.nn.rnn_cell.LSTMCell(3, reuse=tf.AUTO_REUSE)
```
